hero.title:
One Identity.
Every Chain.
Your Control.
hero.description: Forge your on-chain identity. Unify your wallets, socials, and achievements into a single, sovereign passport, powered by zero-knowledge proofs.

content.title: Your On-Chain Life is Fragmented
content.description: Your DeFi achievements are on one chain, your governance history on another, your social capital locked in web2. Each wallet is a separate, anonymous actor.

principles.title: Fragmented Identity
principles.description: Your true reputation is invisible and unrecognized.

principles.title: Scattered Achievements
principles.description: You've done the work, but have nothing to show for it.

principles.title: Anonymous Actors
principles.description: Each wallet is a separate, unconnected identity.

content.title: Unify Your Digital Self
content.description: Porta gives you the tools to forge a comprehensive, private passport from the scattered pieces of your on-chain life. Connect your wallets, link your socials, and mint a single, verifiable asset.

features.title: Connect Your Wallets
features.description: Unify all your on-chain activity into one identity.

features.title: Link Your Socials
features.description: Bridge your web2 social capital to web3.

features.title: Mint Your Passport
features.description: Create a single, verifiable asset representing your reputation.

content.title: A Living Ledger of Your Reputation
content.description: This passport is more than proof-of-humanity; it's the foundational layer for a more meritocratic web3. A future where trust is verifiable, access is earned, and your history is your most valuable asset.

principles.title: Verifiable Trust
principles.description: Build a future where trust is earned and proven.

principles.title: Meritocratic Access
principles.description: Access based on your verifiable reputation and history.

principles.title: Your History as Asset
principles.description: Your on-chain history becomes your most valuable asset.

content.title: The Foundry is Open
content.description: This is not a finished product. This is an invitation to the ground floor. We are seeking pioneers to help forge the first generation of sovereign identities.
content.cta: The future is invite-only. Join the pioneers.

metadata.title: PORTA - Unlock the On-chain Economy
metadata.description: Porta is your private passport to a more trusted and accessible Superchain. Prove you're a unique human, unlock compliant DeFi, and move assets seamlessly—all with one secure identity.
